nodes.name: calculateTargetEpochRewards

calculateTargetEpochRewards().return: The per validator epoch reward, the total rewards to voters, the total community reward, and the total carbon offsetting partner reward.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getCarbonOffsettingFraction().return: The percentage of total reward which goes to the carbon offsetting partner.

getCommunityRewardFraction().return: The percentage of total reward which goes to the community funds.

params.blockNumber: Block number where epoch number is calculated.

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve. Must be within 4 epochs of the current number.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices corresponding to signing validators.

getRewardsMultiplier().return: The rewards multiplier based on the current and target Gold supplies.

getRewardsMultiplierParameters().return: The max multiplier and under/over spend adjustment factors.

getTargetGoldTotalSupply().return: The target Gold supply according to the epoch rewards target schedule.

getTargetTotalEpochPaymentsInGold().return: The total target epoch payments to validators, converted to Gold.

getTargetVoterRewards().return: the total target epoch rewards for voters.

getTargetVotingGoldFraction().return: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.

getTargetVotingYieldParameters().return: The target, max, and adjustment factor for target voting yield.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices correspoinding to signing validators.

getVotingGoldFraction().return: The fraction of floating Gold being used for voting in validator elections.

params._carbonOffsettingFraction: The percentage of rewards going to carbon offsetting partner.
params._carbonOffsettingPartner: The address of the carbon offsetting partner.
params._communityRewardFraction: The percentage of rewards that go the community funds.
params._targetVotingGoldFraction: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry contract.
params.rewardsMultiplierMax: The max multiplier on target epoch rewards.
params.rewardsMultiplierOverspendAdjustmentFact: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch  rewards when the protocol is running ahead of the target Gold supply.
params.rewardsMultiplierUnderspendAdjustmentFac: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch  rewards when the protocol is running behind the target Gold supply.
params.targetVotingYieldAdjustmentFactor: The target block reward adjustment factor for voters.
params.targetVotingYieldInitial: The initial relative target block reward for voters.
params.targetVotingYieldMax: The max relative target block reward for voters.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.partner: The address of the carbon offsetting partner.
params.value: The percentage of the total reward to be sent to the carbon offsetting partner.
The percentage of the total reward to be sent to the community funds.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.max: The max multiplier on target epoch rewards.
params.overspendAdjustmentFactor: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch rewards when the  protocol is running ahead of the target Gold supply.
params.underspendAdjustmentFactor: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch rewards when the  protocol is running behind the target Gold supply.

params.value: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.

params.targetVotingYield: The relative target block reward for voters.

params.adjustmentFactor: The target block reward adjustment factor for voters.
params.max: The max relative target block reward for voters.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateTargetVotingYield().details: Only called directly by the protocol.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.
params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

calculateTargetEpochRewards().notice: Calculates the per validator epoch payment and the total rewards to voters.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getBlockNumberFromHeader(bytes).notice: Parses block number out of header.

getCarbonOffsettingFraction().notice: Returns the carbon offsetting partner reward fraction.

getEpochNumber().notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochNumberOfBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).notice: Gets the parent seal bitmap from the header at the given block number.

getRewardsMultiplier().notice: Returns the rewards multiplier based on the current and target Gold supplies.

getTargetGoldTotalSupply().notice: Returns the target Gold supply according to the epoch rewards target schedule.

getTargetTotalEpochPaymentsInGold().notice: Returns the total target epoch payments to validators, converted to Gold.

getTargetVoterRewards().notice: Returns the total target epoch rewards for voters.

getTargetVotingGoldFraction().notice: Returns the target voting Gold fraction.

getTargetVotingYieldParameters().notice: Returns the target voting yield parameters.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).notice: Verifies the BLS signature on the header and returns the seal bitmap. The validator set used for verification is retrieved based on the parent hash field of the header.  If the parent hash is not in the blockchain, verification fails.

getVotingGoldFraction().notice: Returns the fraction of floating Gold being used for voting in validator elections.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

isReserveLow().notice: Determines if the reserve is low enough to demand a diversion from   the community reward. Targets initial critical ratio of 2 with a linear   decline until 25 years have passed where the critical ratio will be 1.

minQuorumSize(uint256).notice: Returns the minimum number of required signers for a given block number.

minQuorumSizeInCurrentSet().notice: Computes byzantine quorum from current validator set size

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

numberValidatorsInSet(uint256).notice: Gets the size of the validator set that must sign the given block number.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setTargetValidatorEpochPayment(uint256).notice: Sets the target per-epoch payment in Celo Dollars for validators.

setTargetVotingGoldFraction(uint256).notice: Sets the target voting Gold fraction.

setTargetVotingYield(uint256).notice: Sets the target voting yield.  Uses fixed point arithmetic for protection against overflow.

setTargetVotingYieldParameters(uint256,u.notice: Sets the target voting yield parameters.

updateTargetVotingYield().notice: Updates the target voting yield based on the difference between the target and current  voting Gold fraction.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.notice: Gets a validator address from the validator set at the given block number.
